function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Resuspension of bioaerosols and virus particles in the built environment","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne transmission of infectious diseases","Mitigation":"Improving ventilation and air filtration systems, regular cleaning and disinfection of surfaces, and reducing indoor activities that promote particle resuspension","Technologies":"HVAC systems with high-efficiency particulate air (HEPA) filters, ultraviolet germicidal irradiation (UVGI), and electrostatic air purifiers","People":"Occupants of built environments, especially in high-traffic areas","Owner":"Building managers, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of quantitative data for defining environmental control measures against COVID-19","Impact":"Inability to effectively mitigate the risk of indoor transmission","Mitigation":"Conducting thorough environmental surveys, implementing standardized control measures, and promoting data-driven decision-making for environmental control","Technologies":"Environmental monitoring systems, data analytics for outbreak analysis, and real-time air quality sensors","People":"Public health authorities, building managers, and environmental scientists","Owner":"Public health authorities, research institutions"},{"Description":"Outbreaks of COVID-19 linked to common indoor environmental factors","Impact":"Widespread transmission of COVID-19 in built environments","Mitigation":"Identifying and addressing specific indoor environmental factors that promote infection, implementing strict infection control measures, and promoting adherence to public health guidelines","Technologies":"Contact tracing technology, indoor air quality monitors, and behavior analysis tools","People":"Occupants of built environments, public health authorities, and building owners","Owner":"Public health authorities, building managers"}]}
